java.awt.dnd
Class DropTargetEvent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.EventObject
        |
        +--java.awt.dnd.DropTargetEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DropTargetDragEvent, DropTargetDropEvent
public class DropTargetEvent
extends EventObject

Unsafe: The DropTargetEvent is the base class for both the DropTargetDragEvent and the DropTargetDropEvent. It encapsulates the current state of the Drag and Drop operations, in particular the current DropTargetContext.

Since:
1.2
Version:
1.16, 12/03/01
See Also:
